build, qt, refactor: Drop sed commands for win32-g++/qmake.conf

events.message: build, qt, refactor: Drop sed commands for win32-g++/qmake.conf

events.body:
Concept ACK. Removing more `sed` usage in favour of proper build tooling is good.

If this is a no-op then you should also be able to show that before and after (Windows) builds of the Qt libs are identical.

Is this still a work in progress?

> If this is a no-op then you should also be able to show that before and after (Windows) builds of the Qt libs are identical.

You are right. The hashes of unarchived contents of the built Qt packages for master (590e49ccf2af27c6c1f1e0eb8be3a4bf4d92ce8b) and this PR (b95f7f8ac0dc102ece82bb2b97c8123e9da5b806) are identical.

> Is this still a work in progress?

Ready for review now.
